title: ChestCommands插件问题 急
txt_content:
我改的 不知道哪里出问题了0 0小白一个
 #######################+                  +#
#   MENU SETTINGS    #
#+                  +#
######################

menu-settings:

  # name - appears as the title - REQUIRED
  name: '&1空城服务器菜单'

  # rows - the number of rows of the chest - REQUIRED
  rows: 6

  # command - OPTIONAL (you can remove this or set it to '')
  # Bind multiple commands using ; (command: 'menu; m; me')
  command: ''

  # open-with-item - OPTIONAL
  # The menu will open only right-clicking with orange wool [35:1]
  open-with-item:
    id: 357
    left-click: false
    right-click: true


######################
#+                  +#
#       ITEMS        #
#+                  +#
######################


spawn:
  COMMAND: 'spawn'
  NAME: '&e回到主城'
  LORE:
    - '&e点一下就可以回程哦.'
    - '&e简单无脑.'
  ID: 384
  POSITION-X: 1
  POSITION-Y: 1

replies.txt_content: 调了一下 结果没错

replies.author: 一条咸鱼王
replies.txt_content: 是不是右键/左键打开菜单的物品ID重复了?

replies.author: a651327299
replies.txt_content:
# command - OPTIONAL (you can remove this or set it to '')
  # Bind multiple commands using ; (command: 'menu; m; me')
  command: ''   引号中间加指令    
比如是 zz   进服输入/zz就能打开了
